note: This file contains example movie structures for reference. Actual recommendations will come from the API.

exampleMovie.title: Example Movie Title
exampleMovie.content: This is an example movie description that would come from the recommendation API.

expectedFields.title: string - Movie title
expectedFields.releaseYear: number - Year the movie was released

validationRules.title: Must be a non-empty string
validationRules.releaseYear: Must be between 1900 and current year + 1
